items.sentence: Tom wished he hadn\'t promised Mary he\'d help.
I speak French more often than I speak English.
She lost her money, her family and her friends.
She tried to squeeze the juice from the orange.
Tom saw Mary\'s name on the list and added his.
Tom wasn\'t allowed into Mary\'s hospital room.
Tom told me he would be at tomorrow\'s meeting.
I checked to make sure that he was still alive.
I decided to go to college to major in English.
What makes you think I won\'t be able to do it?
I can\'t talk to you here. It\'s too dangerous.
Do you get along well with your new classmates?
Do you have any idea what Tom is talking about?
Has Tom already told you what needs to be done?
Tom doesn\'t let Mary watch TV after 10:00 p.m.
I think all three of us need to get some sleep.
I thought that the police were looking for Tom.
I wish we had visited Tom when we were able to.
I have to check and see what the contract says.
Tom wasn\'t able to do everything he had to do.
